analysis.description:
Bidding.destroyContract (/unique_chucks/26/0xb4910fe410240d2b79c557250adc767a9bc930c1.sol#239-244) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(address(this).balance == 0)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/26/0xb4910fe410240d2b79c557250adc767a9bc930c1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/26/0xb4910fe410240d2b79c557250adc767a9bc930c1.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_duration' of Bidding.addAuction (/unique_chucks/26/0xb4910fe410240d2b79c557250adc767a9bc930c1.sol#197) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_startPrice' of Bidding.addAuction (/unique_chucks/26/0xb4910fe410240d2b79c557250adc767a9bc930c1.sol#197-199) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_operator' of Bidding.setOperator (/unique_chucks/26/0xb4910fe410240d2b79c557250adc767a9bc930c1.sol) is not in mixedCase
